mapper.select: select u.Wx_name as wxname, u.User_name as username, u.User_tele as usertele, u.User_sex as usersex, u.User_old as userold, u.User_business as userbusiness, u.User_area as userarea, u.User_bz as userbz, u.User_company as usercompany, (select User_name from tower_user_info u1 where u1.ID= u.User_tj_id) as usertjname, a.City_id as cityid, a.area_name as areaname, c.City_name as cityname, m.Score as score, m.Experience as exp from tower_user_info u left join tower_user_charge m on m.Wx_id=u.Wx_id left join tower_area a on a.ID=u.User_area left join tower_city c on a.City_id=c.City_id where 1=1 and u.Wx_id=#{wxid} ;

SELECT a.Wx_id as wxid, a.Wx_name as wxname, (case a.User_sex when 1 then '男' when 2 then '女' end ) as sexname, a.Add_time as addtime, a.User_name as username, b.area_name as areaname, c.City_name as cityname, a.User_tele as usertele, a.User_company as usercompany, a.User_bz as userbz, (case a.user_level when 1 then '一级用户' when 2 then '二级用户' when 3 then '三级用户' when 4 then '四级用户' end ) as levelname, d.Type_name as typename, a.User_type as usertype, a.User_state as userstate, (case a.User_state when 0 then '冻结' when 1 then '正常' end ) as statename, e.Order_count as ordercount, e.Succ_count as succcount, e.Ing_count as ingcount, e.Fail_count as failcount, e.Cancel_count as cancelcount, m.Score as score, m.Experience as exp from tower_user_info a LEFT JOIN tower_area b on a.User_area = b.ID LEFT JOIN tower_city c on b.City_id = c.City_id LEFT JOIN tower_user_type d on a.User_type = d.ID LEFT JOIN tower_user_order_info e on a.Wx_id = e.Wx_id LEFT JOIN tower_user_charge m on m.Wx_id=a.Wx_id where a.Wx_id =#{wxid};

select a.Order_id as orderid, b.Tower_id as towerbh, b.Tower_name as towername, a.Tower_fee as towerfee, a.Tower_first_fee as towerfirstfee, a.Tower_end_fee as towerendfee, a.Tower_end_date as towerenddate, case a.Tower_state when 0 then '抢单' when 1 then '弃单' when 2 then '交单' when 3 then '审核拒绝(签约)' when 4 then '审核成功(签约)' when 5 then '付首款审核中' when 6 then '付首款审核成功' when 7 then '付首款审核拒绝' when 8 then '付尾款审核中' when 9 then '完成' when 10 then '付尾款审核拒绝' when 11 then '超时过期' when 12 then '延期' when 13 then '延期申请中' end as towerstatename, a.Tower_add_time as toweraddtime from tower_order_detail a, tower_tower_info b where a.Tower_id = b.ID and a.Tower_wx_id = #{wxid};
select u.User_area as area, a.City_id as city from tower_user_info u left join tower_area a on a.ID=u.User_area left join tower_city c on a.City_id=c.City_id where 1=1 and u.Wx_id=#{wxid} ;
select ID as id, Type_name as typename from tower_user_type
